                    Category category)

      • searchBooksByParameters

        public java.util.List<Book> searchBooksByParameters(java.lang.String title,
                                                    java.lang.String author,
                                                    int edition,
                                                    java.lang.String availability,
                                                    Category category)
        To search for a book using a set of parameters, defaults can be used to ignore a parameter(s) while making a search.
        Parameters:
        title - the title you want to search book by: nullable Or ""
        author - the author you want to search book by: nullable Or ""
        edition - the edition of the book you want to search for: 0 to exclude it
        availability - the availability of the book you want to search for: nullable Or ""
        category - the category to search book from: nullable
        Returns:
        List<Book> A List of book(s) that matches the given parameters

        books user books found
